com.sun.jimi.core.encoder.jpg12
Class JPGEncoder

com.sun.jimi.core.encoder.jpg12.JPGEncoder
public class JPGEncoder
implements OptionsObject

This is an implementation of JPGEncoder that wraps around the functionality provided by the new code available in JDK1.2 beta3
